description:
相关阅读：英国跳水金童戴利出柜为“双性恋”

They are in the throws of their relationship's honeymoon period, so it's understandable that Dustin Lance Black and Tom Daley might get romantic in public.日前出柜的英国跳水金童汤姆-戴利和他的男友达斯汀-兰斯-布莱克正处恋情蜜月期，所以也就不难理解两人在公共场所大秀恩爱了。

The couple, aged 39 and 19, have been pictured looking cosy in Texas as they stopped for fast food.19岁的戴利和他39岁的男友达斯汀在美国德克萨斯州买快餐的时候被拍到了这组照片，镜头前的他们看上去很惬意。

Dustin was pictured proudly showing his support for the Olympian's home country in a Team GB tracksuit top as he sipped Tom's drink from his straw.照片中，达斯汀轻抿男友戴利的饮料吸管，身着英国队队服上衣，毫不掩饰对男友的支持。

Boyfriend Tom looked more incognito in a simple black jacket as they sipped on their soda drinks, but the picture is the first shot of them getting close in public.男友戴利看上去比较低调，他身着一件简单的黑外套喝着汽水。这也是这对情侣在公众场合的第一次曝光。

Tom and Dustin's public appearance as a couple comes soon after he bravely announced his relationship earlier this month and received huge support from his fans and celebrity friends.在戴利本月初鼓足勇气出柜并赢得了粉丝及一众好友的大力支持之后，这对情侣便很快在公共场合现身秀恩爱。

He admitted to chat show host Jonathan Ross that making the decision to come out and reveal his sexuality was "terrifying".在一个访谈节目中，戴利对主持人乔纳森-罗斯承认出柜并告知大众他的性向“很令人害怕”。

Speaking about his new love, Tom said: "I’d never felt like anything like it before. We were at a party and I hadn’t even spoken to him all night. I didn’t know what to do or if he was gay at first."谈及他的新恋情，戴利说：“这种心动的感觉前所未有。我们是在一个派对上认识的，而我甚至整晚都没和他说过一句话。我不知道怎么做，一开始也不知道他是不是同性恋。”

"I’d never felt the feeling of love, it happened so quickly. I hope it doesn’t get ruined by the media attention, everyone has been so supportive and I hope it continues that way." he told Ross.他告诉主持人：“我从来没有过这种恋爱的感觉，一切都发生得太快了。我希望这段感情不会见光死，之前每个人都对我出柜表示支持，希望大家继续支持我们。”
